tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_turnover_policy (
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    turnover_rate DECIMAL(10,2),
    CONSTRAINT unique_product_id UNIQUE (product_id),
    CONSTRAINT positive_quantity CHECK (quantity > 0),
    CONSTRAINT valid_turnover_rate CHECK (turnover_rate >= 0)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_change INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES inventory(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  quantity_ordered INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory_Items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT CHECK (quantity >= 0),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) CHECK (unit_price >= 0.00),
    turnover_ratio DECIMAL(5, 2) CHECK (turnover_ratio >= 0.00)
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT REFERENCES Inventory_Items(item_id),
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity_sold INT CHECK (quantity_sold >= 0),
    selling_price DECIMAL(10, 2) CHECK (selling_price >= 0.00)
);

CREATE TABLE Purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT REFERENCES Inventory_Items(item_id),
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id),
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity_purchased INT CHECK (quantity_purchased > 0),
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2) CHECK (purchase_price > 0.00)
);
